title: Family of man shot by South Carolina police officer receives $6.5 million
text:
Family of man shot by South Carolina police officer receives $6.5 million 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Today 
The North Charleston City Council voted, 10-0, on Thursday to approve the payment to the family of Walter Scott, who was shot and killed in ...
